metadata.synopsis: Minsc enters the new Iron Throne and reacts positively to its location.

0.speaker: Minsc
0.text: The Iron Throne building. Plunked into the waters like the great festering turd that it is.
0.context: NodeContext: Minsc has just realized we stand in the underwater Iron Throne building from BG1. He battled through these halls once before and is glad to see the place has been sunk.
